subject: Re: FW: Moxi V-RS launch kit items list
preview: Thanks Heath,  The image has updated, the items below are still not showing up though?

full_threads.body:
Thanks Heath,

The image has updated, the items below are still not showing up though?

Hi Heath,

Please upload the below as per the spreadsheet:

Remote Adjust Brochure

Pamphlet Log It All How To Guide

UH_Pamphlet_HearingLoss_94x216_EN_028-6686-02

e-Learn

https://learning.myunitron.com/learn/course/internal/view/elearning/4196/moxi-v-rs-new-for-vivante

Please move down the image for the below:



Thank you,

Christine

Thanks Heath,

Please find attached and image link below:

UH_Packshot_VivanteFamily-R-RT-RS-P6-P7-P8_7850x7850.png



Thank you,

Christine

Hi Heath,

I can see that the pamphlet has been uploaded.

The image tile will need to be updated please for the home screen.

Is it possible to have the other items uploaded today please?

Thank you,

Christine

Hi Christine,

These have now been updated on staging:
https://staging-unitronmarketing-staging.kinsta.cloud/marketing-catalogue/

Please note:

  • UH_Datasheet_Moxi-V-RS-4TL_207x279Digital_EN_027-6769-02_V1.00 is not in the folder
  • No image found in the folder to replace the image of Moxi V

Can you please supply those?

done updating thumbnails and the download links.

- UH_Datasheet_Moxi-V-RS-4TL_207x279Digital_EN_027-6769-02_V1.00 is not in the folder
- no image found in the folder to replace the image of Moxi V in https://staging-unitronmarketing-staging.kinsta.cloud/marketing-catalogue/

20mins

Awesome, thanks heaps Heath!

Will wait for your update,

Christine

Hi team,

Hope you are well!

Are we able to get the link to check the clone site tomorrow please?

Thank you,

Christine
Thank you, please just bill us and it can be deducted from the credit available.

Sounds like a plan!

If you can please send us the link to review the clone site.

Were you able to see the bottom of the excel as to where to add in the items?

Please just deduct the costs from the credit we have on the account.

Thank you,

Christine

Hi Christine,

Here's what we will do:

  1. We will make a clone of the LIVE site and put it on a STAGING site.
  2. We will make the updates to the STAGING site and then you can review and approve.
  3. On 21 Aug, we will WRITE OVER the LIVE site with the content from the STAGING site.

This means that any changes made on the LIVE site in between now and 21 AUG will be written over.

Are you ok for us to proceed?

action.text: Rica Rosario Valencia assigned to Glen Tenorio

full_threads.body:
Hi team,

Hope you have been well!

Please find attached items for upload with instructions below.

Please don't make anything live till 21 Aug which is the launch date - can you please send a link for us to preview by 16 Aug?

Thank you,
Christine

From: Salvador, Christine
Sent: Friday, August 11, 2023 10:48 AM
To: Sinclair, Cameron <Cameron.Sinclair@sonova.com>
Subject: FW: Moxi V-RS launch kit items list
Importance: High


For upload digital marketing catalogue.

From: Salvador, Christine
Sent: Wednesday, August 2, 2023 3:32 PM
To: Newby, Eric <Eric.Newby@sonova.com>
Cc: Kalligeris, Irene <Irene.Kalligeris@sonova.com>
Subject: RE: Moxi V-RS launch kit items list
Importance: High


Hi Eric,

Please find attached launch kit items list - please note those for upload for digital launch site and refer to comments in coloumn B.

These will be added to the Moxi V section - if you scroll to the bottom of spreadsheet, you will see comment regarding the tile for this.

Please don't make anything live till 21 Aug which is the launch date - can you please send a link for us to preview by 11 Aug?

Thank you,
Christine

From: Salvador, Christine
Sent: Wednesday, August 2, 2023 11:16 AM
To: Kalligeris, Irene <Irene.Kalligeris@sonova.com>; Newby, Eric <Eric.Newby@sonova.com>
Subject: FW: Moxi V-RS launch kit items list


No worries Irene,

Hi @Newby, Eric, please find attached files ready for upload on Moxi V-RS digital site - I have saved these under Final marketing materials LR folder in teams.

Thanks,
Christine

From: Kalligeris, Irene <Irene.Kalligeris@sonova.com>
Sent: Tuesday, August 1, 2023 6:19 PM
To: Salvador, Christine <Christine.Salvador@unitron.com>
Subject: RE: Moxi V-RS launch kit items list


Hi Christine,


Please see attached the updated clinician resources for Vivante Moxi V-RS which can be added to the digital marketing site.


Thanks.


Kind regards,


Irene Kalligeris
BSc, GradDipAudSc, MClinAud, AAudA, DHRM
Head of Audiology & Product
Sonova Australia


From: Kalligeris, Irene
Sent: Tuesday, August 1, 2023 4:42 PM
To: Salvador, Christine <christine.salvador@unitron.com>
Subject: RE: Moxi V-RS launch kit items list
Importance: High


Hi Christine,


In the new starter kits will be the following Vivante items in hard copy:





So we'll need to ensure these particular resources are printed.
I'll leave it to you to work out the print quantities.


Thanks.


Kind regards,


Irene Kalligeris
BSc, GradDipAudSc, MClinAud, AAudA, DHRM
Head of Audiology & Product
Sonova Australia


From: Salvador, Christine <Christine.Salvador@unitron.com>
Sent: Tuesday, August 1, 2023 1:55 PM
To: Kalligeris, Irene <Irene.Kalligeris@sonova.com>
Subject: RE: Moxi V-RS launch kit items list


Hi Irene,

Thank you, hope you are well too!

Thanks so much, did you want to put in quantities in column H for the ones you need in starter kits as you mentioned?

Thank you,
Christine

From: Kalligeris, Irene <Irene.Kalligeris@sonova.com>
Sent: Tuesday, August 1, 2023 1:46 PM
To: Salvador, Christine <Christine.Salvador@unitron.com>
Subject: RE: Moxi V-RS launch kit items list
Importance: High


Hi Christine,


Hope you're well.
Please see attached.
For background, I updated the attached whilst looking at what is already existing on the digital marketing catalogue.
I've then updated the section in the attached spreadsheet with all the files that should be saved in the relevant sections.


If you have any questions please let me know.


Thanks.


Kind regards,


Irene Kalligeris
BSc, GradDipAudSc, MClinAud, AAudA, DHRM
Head of Audiology & Product
Sonova Australia


From: Salvador, Christine <Christine.Salvador@unitron.com>
Sent: Monday, July 31, 2023 2:49 PM
To: Kalligeris, Irene <Irene.Kalligeris@sonova.com>
Subject: Moxi V-RS launch kit items list


Hi Irene,

Please find attached Moxi V-RS launch kit list, first draft.

The ones in green - not sure if there are new versions of this you want to include?
The ones in light orange - did you want to include these in?

Thank you,
Christine
